subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Soderling, whose playing career was derailed by mononucleosis in 2011, tried to resume training about six months ago, but his body rejected the notion. Now he is the face of the Stockholm Open.
snippet: Soderling, whose playing career was derailed by mononucleosis in 2011, tried to resume training about six months ago, but his body rejected the notion. Now he is the face of the Stockholm Open.
